text: OK Part II done! The userspace editor + userspace exporter playing together nicely. You can try it out <https://observablehq.com/@tomlarkworthy/editable-exports|here>. In theory you should be able to edit, export and upload to S3 without even logging into Observable. (There is not way to manage the layout of a notebook though, thats part III, so its sorta too limited to be useful yet).
